projects.name: Customer Churn Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed customer data and identified key trends in retention. Grouped customers by demographics and usage to find high-risk segments. Found main reasons for churn, such as service issues and usage patterns. Suggested strategies like targeted offers and better service to reduce churn and keep revenue.

projects.name: Global Retail Business Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed global retail sales data to evaluate payment methods and product performance. Created interactive dashboards in Power BI to visualize trends and support decision-making. Recommended strategies to optimize order methods and adjust pricing for key product categories.

projects.name: Retail Store Analysis
projects.description: Developed an interactive dashboard in Streamlit with real-time updates every 5 seconds. Built a data collection form integrated with the Google Sheets API, with automatic storage of submissions. Applied Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn) and Tableau to analyze retail performance and present insights effectively.

certifications.name: Data Analysis & Power BI
certifications.issuer: Institute for Business and Economics Policy (TDTU)

certifications.name: Basic Data Visualization with Power BI
